title: Stupid LP system
body:
Me and my mate have been duoing for ages now
This season we've been doing good, placed in plat 5 and plat 2 after 50 games
So here i am sitting on 85 LP after winning 10 of our last 11 games
We win, i get 14 LP and put on 99, annoyed obviously but i was like "whatever, we'll just win the next one"
We then lose the next one, and i lose 22 LP. So after going 11 wins out of 12 games, 7 game win streak, i gain 14 LP and lose 22
So ive played 60 games this season, have 15 more wins than losses, and i lose 8 more points for a loss than i get for winning
Someone either explain this stupid system or fix this shit
You wonder why the community is so horrible, cause you put them through shit like this

replies.body:
if you were duo Qing with someone with lower MMR then your own, it effects the opponents you play.

as you go higher in the ladder the more the system punishes you for losing to players lower than u


as a rule you shouldn't duo with anyone 2 series ahead or behind you after you reach plat 3 or higher.

imo it creates more problems then it solves

He is plat 1 and i am plat 2, we have very similar mmr's so thats not it
The team we were versing had higher average mmr when we lost

so it makes problems and then fixes them....thats good.

lucky it wasnt THAN.
when you lose games is it a surrender or just a loss, im pretty sure you lose more lp from surrendering then by keep on playing and losing the match
